entry.title: Apple COO Jeff Williams on Apple Watch heart study: 'Hopefully we can save a lot of lives'
entry.quote: Apple is facilitating a massive heart study that will use the Apple Watch to detect a heart abnormality called atrial fibrillation, responsible for 130,000 deaths a year in the U.

entry.title: Alexa for Business
entry.quote: Alexa can also do things around the workplace, like providing directions to a conference room, notifying IT about a broken printer, or placing an order for office supplies.

entry.title: Finding ideas
entry.quote: To find ideas, find problems. To find problems, talk to people, Expect more from the world. Opportunities are all around you.

entry.title: Is Compliance Killing Corporate Innovation?
entry.quote: (1) Build An Alliance — Internally And Externally (2) Reframe The Compliance Hurdle (3) Educate People About The Risks That Are Worth Taking (4) Walk The Talk (5) Experiment. Then Experiment. Then Experiment Again. (6) Never Waste A Good Crisis (7) Break The Rules
